name: cBrain
goal:
cBrain supports public administration in Denmark and abroad based on solutions for bureaucratic management adapted to the complex and dynamic affairs of contemporary public administration
The paperbased classical production line for services is moved from paper to digital tools and a model for digital bureaucracy has been designed
Our goals are to introduce and implement our digital solution F2 to as many governmental institutions as possible hereby making their services and case management more efficient, cost effective, transparent and trustworthy - today cBrains solution is used in more than 2/3 of all Danish ministries, agencies and institutions. cBrain is also present in the UK ( University), Germany (large pension fond ) , France ( City of Paris ), the USA ( large federal institution ) and Dubai ( financial ministry ) . Further, cBrain is looking to enter the private market
interests: Business and Industry, Digital economy and society, Fraud prevention, Institutional affairs, International co-operation and development, Single market, Trans-European Networks
euInitiatives: Not yet following any of the above
